short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A selection of hand crafted email templates for you to use. Insert a template from Commpass into a message draft with a few clicks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Accountants and bookkeepers: create emails in Gmail with a couple of clicks.

The plugin gives you a curated selection of proven sales, marketing and workflow templates for communicating with clients and prospects.

Templates include:
- Ask a client for a referral
- Ask a client for a Google or Facebook review
- Follow up a proposal
- Template when someone is late for a meeting
- Reactivate cold deals

Free forever and no account set-up needed. Just install the Chrome plugin, open Google Mail and start sending emails.
